candidates.title: Prepare a new release
candidates.body: Moves to using tokio-uring and kioto-uring-executor from crates.io, so that we can publish the crate normally again.

candidates.title: Use zerocopy whenever possible
candidates.body: Also adds first steps towards mmap support

candidates.title: Move synchronous API to a separate lsm-sync crate
Fix wisckey feature
candidates.body: We accidentally started truncating files, which was not intended.

candidates.title: Add more tests for write-ahead logging
Allow logging the number of tables per level
Fix potentially flushing memtables in the wrong order

repo.name: lsm-rs
repo.description: Modular, Asynchronous Implementation of a Log-Structured Merge Tree
